description: Increments the post count for a specific user
Updates a user's ranking to a specified ranking ID
Activates or deactivates a user account
Restores a previously deleted user account
Retrieves a list of all users in the system
Retrieves a paginated list of users with specified start and count
Retrieves all users with their karma information
Retrieves a paginated list of users with their karma information
Retrieves users belonging to a specific group with pagination
Retrieves information about the most recently registered user
Counts the total number of users in the system
Counts the total number of users in a specific group
Checks if a specific user has been marked as deleted
Verifies if a username is already registered in the system
Authenticates a user by validating username and password
Assigns a user to one or more groups
Removes a user from one or more groups
Updates a user's password using their email address
Validates a password recovery hash for a user's email address
